verse: स्वसुखनिभृतचेतास्तद्व्युदस्तान्यभावोऽप्यजितरुचिरलीलाकृष्टसारस्तदीयम् व्यतनुत कृपयायस्तत्त्वदीपं पुराणं तमखिलवृजिनघ्नं व्याससूनुं नमामि

स्वसुखनिभृतचेतास्तद्व्युदस्तान्यभावोऽप्य.स्वसुखनिभृतचेता: whose minds are filled with personal happiness

overall_meaning: I bow to Vyasa's son, the destroyer of all sins, whose minds are filled with personal happiness, whose external troubles are removed, even their undefeated desire for playfulness is attracted to his essence, spreading the lamp of truth by grace, effort, and ancient wisdom.
